pr_title: Move RemoteSplit URI construction from coordinator to worker

timeline.bodyText: what are other string options except ASCII String? :P
timeline.author: wenleix

replies.bodyText: It has a toString as well. The only difference is that toASCIIString will also encode the result string when there is non-ASCII character in the string. Do you have a preference? :)
replies.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.bodyText: Do we wanna create an abstraction called Location rather than using raw string? I'm thinking to replace the URI interfaces in LocationFactory all with Location.
timeline.author: highker

timeline.message:
Move RemoteSplit URI construction from coordinator to worker

Coordinator could spend ~200ms to construct the URIs in a single
thread, which does not seem necessary and could be done in workers.
